name: Felicette Pedigree Litters
author: Burria

sections.description:
Creates a custom content type to upload litters.
Let you select the mother and father of every litter and then displays in on the content.
It’s compatible with Laika Pedigree Tree plugin, and can add litters on Laika’s content type.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Felicette_Configuration to configure the plugin
  4. To view the page displaying all pets:
    • Create a new page and copy the page ID on settings (Felicette Configuration), ID of the Archive
    • When you link to this page you can add filters by arguments for tags (optional)
    • For example mysite.com/yourpage/?tags=featured will filter only those with this tag.
    • mysite.com/yourpage/?tags=germanshepherd+champion will filter only those with the tags ‘germanshepherd’ plus ‘champion’
sections.changelog:
0.3

Arguments on Archive
Better Settings Page
New style on archive
Fixed a CSS bug when there was no image

0.1

Release Date – 30 October 2016

  • First Alpha version.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Felicette_Configuration to configure the plugin
  4. To view the page displaying all pets:
    • Create a new page and copy the page ID on settings (Felicette Configuration), ID of the Archive
    • When you link to this page you can add filters by arguments for tags (optional)
    • For example mysite.com/yourpage/?tags=featured will filter only those with this tag.
    • mysite.com/yourpage/?tags=germanshepherd+champion will filter only those with the tags ‘germanshepherd’ plus ‘champion’
